Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Specimen Container(s): Columbia blood agar with 5% sheep blood
Trypticase soy agar with 5% sheep blood
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization time-of-flight (MALDI-TOF) mass spectrometry
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bruker Daltonics MBT-CA System using MALDI-TOF mass spectrometry for identification of Gram-negative bacterial colonies from human specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic mass spectrometer system for identification of Gram-negative bacterial colonies cultured from human specimens, used in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings to aid in the diagnosis of Gram negative bacterial infections.
